titles.title: 633 Jesus Thy Life Is Mine (difficult to match wor

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus Thy life is mine
Dwell evermore in me
And let me see
That nothing can
Untwine Thy life from mine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thy life in me be shown
Lord I would henceforth seek
To think and speak
Thy thoughts Thy words alone
No more my own

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thy love - Thy joy - Thy peace
Continuously impart
Unto my heart
Fresh springs that never cease
But still increase

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The blest reality
Of resurrection power
Thy Church's dower
Life more abundantly
Lord give to me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thy fullest gift O Lord
Now at Thy word I claim
Through Thy dear name
And touch the reapturous chord
Of praise forth-poured

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Jesus my life is Thine
And evermore shall be
Hiddedn in Thee
For nothing can untwine
Thy life from mine
